articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: The Mars Express spacecraft is finally getting a Windows 98 upgrade - The Verge
articles.description: The European Space Agency is finally upgrading its Mars Express spacecraft from Windows 98-era software. The upgrade will allow the orbiter to improve the quality of data that’s sent back to Earth.
articles.content:
Windows 98 is an alien OS in the year 2022
The Mars Express.
Image: European Space Agency
Engineers at the European Space Agency (ESA) are getting ready for a Windows 98 upgrade on an orbiter circ… [+2441 chars]

articles.title: Amid Russian Invasion, Ukraine Gets European Union Candidate Status - NDTV
articles.description: European Union leaders granted candidate status Thursday to Ukraine and Moldova in a strong show of support against Russia's invasion, as the United States said it was sending Kyiv more high-precision rocket systems.

articles.title: Eswatini: 'Winter revolution' cripples international company, locals affected - News24
articles.description: Eswatini's "winter revolution" has derailed a European Union-funded project as pro-democracy groups push for the abdication of King Mswati III.
articles.content:
• Inyatsi Construction's European Union-funded water harvesting project is in limbo after attacks.
  • The company has been forced to shut down after three terror attacks this year.
